prompts: Create a mystical fox-like Pokemon with elegant tails and a shimmering coat.
I want a fire-type Pokemon with a graceful, flowing body and multiple tails.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest, with white and golden fur.
Make a legendary creature that resembles a beautiful fox with ethereal tails.
Imagine a Pokemon that glows in the moonlight, showcasing its elegant features.
Design a magical creature with a serene expression and enchanting tails.
Show me a Pokemon that symbolizes beauty and grace, with a fiery core.
